H2.text: when did we start war with iraq. 2003

H3.text: when did we start war with iraq. 2001

A4.text: The war began on March 20, 2003, when the US, joined by the UK, Australia, and Poland, initiated a 'shock and awe' bombing campaign.

A5.text: One month after the passage of the Iraq Liberation Act, the US and UK launched a bombardment campaign of Iraq called Operation Desert Fox.
